1.0.name: wordpress/saint-du-jour
1.0.description:
This widget displays the saint of the day, according to the timetable of the ordinary and/or the extraordinary form of Roman Catholic rite.

Custom

Once the plugin Saint du jour has been activated and the widget published, it immediately displays the saint of the day with default parameters. After, you can modify all parameters in widget's administration. For good styling, you have to define .saintdujour_forme and .saintdujour_saint classes.

Multilanguage

Saint du jour speaks English, French !
Could you translate Saint du jour in your language ? Please contact me !
